entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

Appå…§è³¼è²·

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼š$150.00 â†’ $30.00 [$30.00 ~ $150.00]

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$60.00

Appå…§è³¼è²·

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼š$30.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Todayâ€™s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization â€¢ Unlimited notes storage â€¢ Multiple note colors â€¢ Pinned & private notes â€¢ Custom font styles & font sizes â€¢ Sort notes by name or date â€¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time â€¢ Easy note sharing â€¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security â€¢ App lock with multiple passcode options â€¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync â€¢ iCloud sync for notes â€¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications â€¢ Widget for todayâ€™s notes â€¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager â€¢ Create and manage PDF files â€¢ Edit existing PDFs â€¢ Export notes as PDF â€¢ Share PDFs easily â€¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs â€¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. Weâ€™re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPad

entry.title: Demumu
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$220.00 â†’ $35.00 [$30.00 ~ $220.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$35.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

A lightweight safety tool crafted for solo dwellers, establishing invisible safety protection through check-in monitoring and emergency contact mechanisms to make solitary life more reassuring Â· Automatic Notification for Unchecked-In Days Â· Set up one emergency contact (family member or friend) in advance. If you havenâ€™t checked in via the app for consecutive days, the system will automatically send an email to them the next day to promptly convey safety anomalies and gain critical intervention time for potential risks Â· Effortless Setup & Use Â· No registration or login required. Simply enter the contactâ€™s name and email to complete setup on first use. Tap to check in daily, with the background automatically monitoring your status without disturbing daily routines to ensure easy and convenient operation Â· Strict Privacy Protection Â· Uses encryption technology to safeguard emergency contact information and check-in records. Refuses to collect irrelevant permissions like location, eliminating privacy leakage risks and ensuring personal information security for trustworthy safety guardianship Â· For All Solo Dwellers Â· Whether youâ€™re a solo office worker, a student living away from home, or anyone choosing a solitary lifestyle, Demumu serves as your safety companion: daily check-ins signal safety, while abnormal situations trigger early notifications to give those who care about you peace of mind and add a layer of protection for yourself Alone but not lonely, safety by your side. Protect every solitary moment with simple solutions and build a solid safety line for solo living User Agreement: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/UserAgreement.html Privacy Policy: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/PrivacyPolicy.html Official Email: Demumuofficial@nexun.vip Demumu Team

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPhone

iPad

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put itâ€! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.
